meanings.definition: The act of making something into a ritual.
meanings.sent1: The ritualization of our morning routine brought a sense of calm to our day.
meanings.sent2: Her ritualization of preparing tea every evening became a comforting habit.
meanings.sent3: The ritualization of tying shoelaces in a special way made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The ritualization of greeting each other with a secret handshake added a touch of magic to our friendship.
meanings.sent5: The ritualization of lighting candles symbolized hope and unity in our community.

meanings.definition: The process of turning an action into a ritual.
meanings.sent1: Through ritualization, the simple act of cooking dinner became a cherished tradition.
meanings.sent2: The ritualization of bedtime stories made bedtime a special time for the family.
meanings.sent3: The ritualization of high-fives after a successful game made the team laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ritualization of morning stretches transformed the routine into a dance of awakening.
meanings.sent5: The ritualization of Sunday brunch turned a meal into a celebration of togetherness.

meanings.definition: The transformation of a behavior into a ritual.
meanings.sent1: The ritualization of exercise turned a chore into a joyful daily practice.
meanings.sent2: Her ritualization of journaling before bed became a soothing nighttime ritual.
meanings.sent3: The ritualization of taking out the trash in a silly dance made chores fun.
meanings.sent4: The ritualization of saying 'I love you' every night turned a habit into a ritual of love.
meanings.sent5: The ritualization of planting seeds in spring symbolized growth and renewal in our garden.
